meanings.definition: The quality of having an attractive or pleasing shape.
meanings.sent1: Her dance performance was praised for its shapeliness and grace.
meanings.sent2: The dress accentuated her shapeliness, making her feel confident.
meanings.sent3: The cake's shapeliness was so perfect that it seemed almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the shapeliness of the mountain in his landscape painting.
meanings.sent5: The shapeliness of the vase made it a standout piece in the collection.

meanings.definition: The state of being well-proportioned or having a pleasing form.
meanings.sent1: The model's shapeliness on the runway caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: His workout routine helped him achieve a level of shapeliness he was proud of.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's shapeliness was so adorable that it melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: The garden's shapeliness was a testament to the gardener's skill and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The shapeliness of the building's architecture was truly impressive.
